session_overview.focus: AI competency integration and measurable outcomes

immediate_actions.current_text: The Language Center demonstrates clear mission alignment with strong leadership and effective committee structures. DAA praised the successful accomplishment of mission objectives through three competencies: cognitive, interpersonal/cross-cultural, and intrapersonal. Key recommendations focus on multilingualism requirements, English proficiency indicators, and AI competency integration.
immediate_actions.suggested_change: The Language Center demonstrates clear mission alignment with strong leadership and effective committee structures. DAA praised the successful accomplishment of mission objectives through three competencies: cognitive, interpersonal/cross-cultural, and intrapersonal. Key recommendations focus on multilingualism requirements, English proficiency indicators, and measurable AI competency with rubric-based assessment integration.
immediate_actions.reason: Makes AI competency concrete and assessable

immediate_actions.current_text: Recommend LC's PILOs and CILOs explicitly list AI competency as required competency within Cognitive and Communicative Competency.
immediate_actions.suggested_change: Recommend LC's PILOs and CILOs explicitly list measurable AI competency with rubric-based assessment as required competency within Cognitive and Communicative Competency.
immediate_actions.reason: Makes AI competency concrete and assessable

immediate_actions.current_text: - All LC credit-bearing courses updated (some pending procedural approval) to include AI competency development as CILO
immediate_actions.suggested_change: - All LC credit-bearing courses updated (some pending procedural approval) to include measurable AI competency with rubric-based assessment development as CILO
immediate_actions.reason: Makes AI competency concrete and assessable

immediate_actions.current_text: **AI Integration Alignment:** Both documents emphasize AI competency development with 27 mentions in DAA Report and 20 mentions in Language Education Paper, indicating strong institutional commitment to AI integration.
immediate_actions.suggested_change: **AI Integration Alignment:** Both documents emphasize measurable AI competency with rubric-based assessment development with 27 mentions in DAA Report and 20 mentions in Language Education Paper, indicating strong institutional commitment to AI integration.
immediate_actions.reason: Makes AI competency concrete and assessable

immediate_actions.suggested_change: Provide more hands-on AI monthly AI innovation workshops:

immediate_actions.text_to_insert: **AI Innovation Priority:** Integrate AI competency development across all LC programs by AY 2025-26.
**AI Innovation Priority:** Integrate AI competency development across all LC programs by AY 2025-26.
**AI Assessment Pilot:** 50% of courses will trial AI-enhanced feedback systems by end of AY 2025-26.
immediate_actions.reason: Concrete AI initiative with measurable target

secondary_actions.suggested_change: 1. *"In addition to the Language Centre, which keeps track of students’ language performance, academic programmes of faculties also incorporate programme-specific communication proficiency into the assessment criteria and develop the rubrics accordingl..."* with AI-assisted feedback systems
